items.title: Adobe After Effects CC: Complete Course - Novice to Expert

visible_instructors.job_title: Motion Graphics / Visual Effects / Video Editing

items.headline: Adobe After Effects CC Create stunning Motion Graphics, VFX Visual Effects & VFX Compositing with 50+ practice projects.
objectives_summary: How to use all of After Effects CC - in a dynamic, hands on approach.
Boost your creativity by completing 50+ Practice Activities and projects from simple to complex.
Create Motion Graphics to enhance your videos using a step by step, easy-to-use method.

items.title: Creating 3D environments in Blender
items.headline: This course helps you creating wonderful environment scenes, organizing your workflow, and find the right inspiration.
objectives_summary: Creating stunning unique environments
Organize your workflow to make large environment scenes
More than 250 unique 2K / 4K textures

items.title: After Effects - Motion Graphics & Data Visualization

visible_instructors.title: Daniel Walter Scott
visible_instructors.name: Daniel Walter
visible_instructors.job_title: Adobe Certified Instructor & Adobe Certified Expert

items.headline: Using Adobe After Effects create beautiful VFX Visual Effects, data visualization & VFX Compositing.
objectives_summary: You'll learn to take Excel spread sheets and animate this in After Effects.
You’ll learn how to make animated pie charts, line charts & bar graphs.
You’ll learn how to create percentage counters.

items.title: Designing for 3D Printing with Fusion 360
items.headline: Learn to design for 3D printing with my easy to follow video lessons using Fusion 360
objectives_summary: Learn the skills to design your own models for 3D printing using  Autodesk Fusion 360, a very powerful and free software for 3D design.

items.title: SOLIDWORKS: Become a Certified Associate Today (CSWA)
items.headline: SolidWorks Training: Learn to Master SolidWorks to the Associate Certification Level Even if You are a Complete Beginner
objectives_summary: Confidently list your SOLIDWORKS skills in your resume
Use SOLIDWORKS to design/draft your next innovation
Take, with confidence, the SOLIDWORKS Associate Certification test - CSWA

items.title: The Blender 2.8 Encyclopedia
items.headline: Complete beginner-to-advanced guide for Blender 2.8 and 2.9
objectives_summary: This is a comprehensive course for the free 3D modeling and animation package, Blender.
With this reference, you can confidently dive into Blender
You can watch this course from start to finish, or skip around.

items.title: Maya for Beginners: Complete Guide to 3D Animation in Maya
items.headline: Learn everything you need for 3D animation in Autodesk Maya: Modeling, Texturing, Lighting, Rigging, Animation, Dynamics
objectives_summary: You will become comfortable using Autodesk Maya to model, texture, rig, animate, dynamics, light, and render
Build and design your own 3D objects
Animate your 3D objects with keyframes

Take your rendering knowledge from basic to pro by following along with multiple projects using a pro workflow
Become comfortable creating with the two industry standard software packages, 3ds Max and V-Ray

items.title: VFX: Complete Houdini Bootcamp
items.headline: Beginners guide to Houdini FX : The most powerful 3D FX application in the world. No prior knowledge required.
objectives_summary: You will learn how to create professional Explosions.
You will have solid knowledge on how to use Houdini.
You will learn how to create realistic oceans.
